comparison.description: How the temperature should be compared to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: How the temperature should be compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: Which value the temperature should be compared to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: Which value the temperature should be compared to.

type.description:
[Biome Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/biome_condition_types/temperature)

Checks for the temperature of the biome the entity is currently in.

Type ID: `origins:temperature`

!!! note

    You can visit [Minecraft Wiki: Biome (List of Overworld climates)](https://minecraft.wiki/w/Biome#List_of_Overworld_climates) for a list of temperature values for the vanilla biomes.
